sentences.en: At least let us rejoice that we have got back our childhood again.
sentences.cn: 至少让我们为现在又返回我们童年时代而欢呼吧.

sentences.en: Don't rejoice so soon!
sentences.cn: 且慢高兴!

sentences.en: Elinor had ceased to rejoice in the dryners of the season.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺先表示出了自己由于这些日子气候干燥而产生的高兴心情.

sentences.en: Elinor had ceased to rejoice in the dryness of the season.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺不再为这些日子气候干燥而高兴.

sentences.en: Garbo plays the queen, rejoicing in the love she has found with Antonio.
sentences.cn: 嘉宝饰演沉浸在与安东尼奥爱情的欣喜中的王后。

sentences.en: How will you rejoice and applaud yourself if you abstain?
sentences.cn: 如果你避开了,你将如何欢欣鼓舞和庆幸自己?

sentences.en: I rejoice that you have recovered so quickly.
sentences.cn: 听到你已很快痊愈了,我很高兴.

sentences.en: I rejoice that you will be at my side in momentous times.
sentences.cn: 将来到重要的时刻,你将在我的身边,这使我很高兴.

sentences.en: I rejoice to hear that you have been reconciled.
sentences.cn: 听到你们和解,我很高兴.

sentences.en: I rejoice to hear your success.
sentences.cn: 听到你的成功我很高兴.

sentences.en: I rejoice to see you here.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴能在这儿见到你.

sentences.en: KJV Yea, my reins shall rejoice, when thy lips speak right things.
sentences.cn: [新译]你的嘴唇说正直话的时候, 我的内心就欢乐.

sentences.en: rejoices in a keen mind.
sentences.cn: 拥有敏锐的头脑

sentences.en: The mountains rejoice in an average annual rainfall of thirty inches.
sentences.cn: 山区的年平均降雨量为30英寸.

sentences.en: This should be wonderful news for... well, for all women born in 1979 and 1980, who can rejoice in the realisation that they are – or are about to be – at their peak.
sentences.cn: 这对所有在1979 和1980 年出生的女人来说应该是一个很棒的消息，她们会为自己正处于或即将处于人生的黄金时刻而感到高兴。

sentences.en: Today you may rejoice because of contacts, news or visits from friends who live in another city or country.
sentences.cn: 今天您可能因为得到来自另一个城市或国家的朋友的联系、消息或拜访而感到高兴。

sentences.en: We rejoice in his good health.
sentences.cn: 我们为他的身体健康感到高兴.

sentences.en: We sincerely rejoice over your victories.
sentences.cn: 我们为你们的胜利感到由衷地高兴.

sentences.en: When the war ended, people finally had cause to rejoice.
sentences.cn: 战争结束，人们终于可以欢欣鼓舞了。

sentences.en: Why is it that we rejoice at a birth and grieve at a funeral? Is it because we are not the person concerned?
sentences.cn: 我们为何在（人家）出生之时高兴而在殡殓之时又悲伤呢？是否因为我们不属于关人士才这样的？

words.tran_cn: 使欣喜（rejoice的ing形式）；感到高兴

trans.tran_en: to feel or show that you are very happy
to feel or show that you are very happy
to feel or show that you are very happy
